blocks.text:
I decided to not add any browser or iframe features at this time. I know lots of people use online music players but those sites don't like others wrapping their site and the DRM can make it very hard to pull off. Also You Tube doesn't allow playing iframes in the background and has to show the iframe the entire play of it at least about 200px by 200px.

This program is turning out more like hard drive audio video toys. Should still be fun. I don't plan to make it very expensive anyway. Maybe like 10 USD or 15 with deals or something.

I was under the wrong impression when I started this project. I am not supposed to wrap the music.youtube.com site or youtube.com site, I am only allowed to use the iframe player. This changes the project so I will either have to strip out all the you tube stuff or show at least a small player at all times if playing anything from them. I took down the download link because I thought it was allowed in that version. I can do a picture in picture kind of thing but we will have to have our own links unless I curate and provide them, which doesn't sound like such a bad thing.

I know I am slow, sorry about that, there are some real life complications. I will continue work on it when I get the chance. There is good news though, the Vuplex browser now routs audio through Unity so there is Unity audio components available like echo and stuff. I have implemented a better menu and UI.

If the quit menu is not working, it's not a hack its just a underlying bug. You will have to use task manager (Alt F4 might work on it) to close it if that happens. The music may continue to play for a min (seems to auto close after a min or so) after that or until you close the Vuplex task manager process (this is the built in browser). I am trying to figure out a fix.

Update: I have the fix and fix for the overnight bug listed in the readme also. I am going through a rewrite, should be out in a few days.

Update two: I put up a fixed version. Changing hotkeys broke for now. There is static global hotkeys. Play/Pause is Alt, Shift, F10. Next Song is Alt, Shift, F11. Previous Song is Alt, Shift, F12.
Fixed a bug with the second browser window not stopping its videos when top right clicked.
Small update with a fix for when the window changes size from some outside code. Same download link.
